courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Undergraduate degree in foods, nutrition, or comparable background in chemistry, microbiology, physiology, or other biological science; consent of instructor.
description: Students acquire knowledge and gain professional skills in the oral presentation of current food science and/or human nutrition topics. Prerequisite: Undergraduate degree in foods, nutrition, or comparable background in chemistry, microbiology, physiology, or other biological science; consent of instructor.
label: Seminar in Foods and Nutrition
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Food Science & Human Nutrition or Nutritional Sciences department.
